p: In this study, the sequences including 3040 matK sequences (307 genera, 1900 species), 641 rbcL sequences (55 genera, 192 species), 225 ndhF sequences (102 species, 29 genera), and 384 ycf1 sequences (48 genera, 173 species) of Orchids were obtained from the NCBI Nucleotide database ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) for further analyses.
